oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Effects of 1α-OHD₃ Injection on Plasma Concentrations of 1,25-(OH)₂D₁ PTH and Ca in Hypocalcemic Cows
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Naito, Y.
Makino, H.
Sato, R.
Murakami, D.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: calcium concentrations
parturient hypocalcemia
milk fever
prophylactic treatment
parturition
1α-OHD₃
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The purpose of the present study was, therefore, to investigate the effects of injection of 1α-OHD₃ to cows within 24 h before parturition to make wide use of 1α-OHD₃ injection for prophylactic treatment against milk fever.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1992: Volume 3; 306-311
